title: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: When using JDK 1.4, the Open Type dialog incorrectly displays obfuscated classes (such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd') alongside the intended classes. These obfuscated classes should not be shown in the dialog to avoid confusion.
OB: Obfuscated classes ('a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd') appear prominently in the Open Type dialog.
EB: Obfuscated classes ('a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd') should be hidden or displayed less prominently in the Open Type dialog.
